attributes.action: Sunday service in Cirencester to Swindon needs to be reinstated
attributes.additional_details: Gloucestershire County Council has withdrawn the only Sunday bus service from Cirencester to Swindon (51A) saying that there isn't demand for it and not cost effective. There is demand for the service and the service needs to be reinstated.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Gloucestershire County Council.
